name: The Last Cigarette On Earth
description:
The Last Cigarette On Earth

Rules:

Use Lighter to heal

do not get smoked.

Controlls:

Keyboard:

Up/Down/Left/Right - Move

Space: Shoot

Mouse: 

Hold Left Click - Move & Shoot

Mobile ( Tested on Android)

Hold Touch - Move & Shoot

Made by 1 Person  - Game is still in development! Needs some fixes (like laser / End Boss and and and...) BUT ITS PLAYABLE ON YOUR PHONE!

Semesterproject for : Go Rogue in the Browser

Supervised by: Sebastian Stamm & Florian Berger
